intro: Micradenia crassinoda, commonly known as the broad-leafed micradenia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and southern Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species with showy flowers and aromatic properties. Micradenia crassinoda is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and shrublands.
